text: Crazy Ex-Girlfriend basically blew everything up in the season two finale. A refresher: Rebecca (Rachel Bloom) and Josh (Vincent Rodriguez III) were about to get married...until Josh ran off to... ...... read full story
title: Allow Crazy Ex-Girlfriend's Donna Lynne Champlin to Regale You With Her Stalking Story
